Xzandre was an clever and creative woman, but suffered from overconfidence.
Xzandre possessed a hat of disguise, which looked like a red silk ribbon embroidered with gold thread. She used it to take the appearance of Meggin the innkeeper.
Xzandre ran a smuggling ring in the Dock Ward of Waterdeep. In addition she managed the Ships Prow tavern under the guise of Meggin, one of her victims.
Xzandre was deeply loyal to Jarlaxle Baenre, but lost his favors. In an attempt to regain his good graces, she distributed false treasure maps to thwart his competitors while he was looking for Dagult Neverembers dragon cache.
Circa the , Xzandre assassinated Meggin in order to take over her inn. She kept the young womans corpse salted, in a barrel, within a hidden room in the the citys sewers below her shop.
